metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17095 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue has been discovered in mpruett Audio File Library (aka audiofile) 0.3.6, 0.3.5, 0.3.4, 0.3.3, 0.3.2, 0.3.1, 0.3.0. A heap-based buffer overflow in Expand3To4Module::run has occurred when running sfconvert.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-17095` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

audiofile-tools - 0.3.6-5build1
libaudiofile1 - 0.3.6-5build1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> no fix as of 2018-09-18 ebarretto> It looks like upstream is not active anymore, some of the open CVEs have a proposed fix on a fork.

criterions.comment: audiofile package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.6-5build1').
